channel.title: [PI] 2 problems [PI]
channel.description:
alright. first problem is pretty simple... nothing drops bones. i looked in my NPCconstants.tsm and the correct bone is listed for the correct monsters; so i wonder if i need an NPCconstants.cfg.
second problem is more of a preference.. i'd like to add something to the slayer shop. i know how to do this, i just dont know how to change the value of that item in slayer points... any ideas?
